title: Penguins of Madagascar: Dibble Dash
description:
OK my fellow penguin-cadets. Think you have what it takes to join Skipper, Kowalski, Rico, and Private in a TOP SECRET mission? The boys and I have been perfecting years of secret agent speed, agility, lightning reflexes, and finding the perfect Cheesy Dibbles (critical in any mission). In our latest adventures, Penguins of Madagascar: Dibble Dash, we battle Dave the Octopus in an endless runner adventure like no other! 

Using quick, Penguin-like reflexes, swipe to control all four Penguins at once as they navigate through intricate courses and alleyways! YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to move like Rico, think like Kowalski and learn like Private all while keeping it cool like me, Skipper, to keep the Penguins safe from DaveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mutant-creating goo. Remember, physical strength will only get you so far. As Kowalski might say - brains are an important part of this operation. 

Features 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Practice Math with the Penguins! Ã¢â‚¬â€ This mission isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t all brawn- youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to use your brain as well. Addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division Ã¢â‚¬â€ just a few of the essential math topics players can practice while playing this endlessly fun game. There is also more educational content on the way! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use Power Ups for an extra boost! Ã¢â‚¬â€ KowalskiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s put together some special Power Ups to help you escape from tight situations. Select from a variety of different Power Ups that will help you save the Penguins! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Avoid the henchmen and mutant goo! Ã¢â‚¬â€ Put your training to the test as you outrun the octopus henchmen and avoid the mutant-creating goo. If all the Penguins turn into mutants, the game ends! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Complete Daily Missions for more points! Ã¢â‚¬â€ ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no shortage of Top Secret codes that need cracking- play every day for NEW, classified Daily Missions! The more you play, the more rewards you earn. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play more with special Expansion Packs! Ã¢â‚¬â€ Achieve higher security clearance and access more top secret files and missions with special educational Expansion Packs. 

PLEASE NOTE: 
Penguins of Madagascar: Dibble Dash is free to play, but contains in-app purchases for additional items such as power-ups that grant you extra lives and help you in the game. You may lock out the ability to purchase the upgrade by disabling in-app purchases through your device's settings.
